document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">noticed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">People </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">disappeared </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">child </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Supposed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">visited </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">remote </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">settled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Regions </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">wild </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Now </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">both </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">visited </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">settled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Regions </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">wild </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">vaster, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">died </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">Fact </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9870ff">witheld </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff7ae0">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">child </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: I noticed people disappeared
